name: 10PrintChr$wler
description:
C64 Style arcade game in a random PETSCII Labyrinth

made for the www.berlinminijam.de ( The theme was Black and White )

Use WASD or the Arrow Keys to move the red dot through the labyrinth

Avoid the border, the dot can not survive outside the boundaries!

Use SPACE to shuffle the walls around the dot, but beware for every shuffle the maze grows even faster!

Survive as long as possible !

10 PRINT CHR$(205.5+RND(1)); : GOTO 10 is a one line BASIC program that generates a simple fascinating maze.

( inspired by the Book from Ian Bogost 10print.org )

C64 font by style64.org
